content:
Resident dining privileges include:

Sweet and Savory breakfast presentations:

  • Weekdays between 6.30am and 10.30am
  • Weekends between 7.00am and 11.00am

Barista bar and non-alcoholic beverages

Light fare and a curated selection of alcoholic beverages (wine, beer and prosecco) served during Hours of Indulgence

  • Daily between 5.00pm and 7.00pm

Downton Abby Offer

  • Enjoy preferred rates, two complimentary tickets to the exhibition and two cocktails inspired the show's characters.
